experciences.title: Internship Laboratoires Adam, Asepta
experciences.text:
During this internship at "Les laboratoires Adam", my mission was to analyse an App called GPRD that was used as a data base for the R&D service.

I have written situational analysis and I have developed a prototype of a new App in PHP and MySQL.

You can learn more about this project here

experciences.title: Internship Blocksi SAS,
experciences.text:
During this internship at Blocksi SAS,my mission was to realize testing for differents features of the application. I also develpped a new feature for the Blocksi App using Javascript and NodeJS.

Blocksi is a TechEd App that enable teachers to be able to fully control a classroom, This app also manage all the connexions from students computers and check for any inapropriate content

experciences.title: Internship Exsymol SAM
experciences.text:
During this internship at Exsymol, my mission was to develope new forms using Qualios a DMS that enable the users to easily save and exchange data.

To code these form I used HTML/CSS and Javascript

experciences.title: Linguistic trip in Australia
experciences.text:
From June to August 2016, I have stayed in Australia where I lived for 2 months in an australian family.

I went to the Matthew Findler anglican school during half of this trip
